秒.definition: second (unit of time); arc second (angular measurement unit); (coll.) instantly

秒射.definition: to ejaculate within a few seconds during sex

秒殺.definition: (Internet) flash sale; (sports or online gaming) rapid dispatch of an opponent

秒看.definition: (coll.) to take in at a glance

秒秒鐘.definition: in a matter of seconds; swiftly; rapidly
